manipulation

Class WorkFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • manipulation.WorkFile

  • public class WorkFile
extends java.lang.Object

    This class encapsulates the covertext and stegotext files and their associated functions

        public java.lang.String checkFileExtension(java.lang.String fileName)
